name: Modern Police VS Crime
description:
Modern Police VS Crime is all about making a safe prison escape from the jail. Get ready to fight with security of police flight and SWAT. Show extreme stealth skills with your sniper gun inside the city and help your lockup criminals and gang fellows in this latest prison breakout game and flying car game.
Features

• Interesting Game Play
. Different Flying cars like Flying Helicopter car, Flying Police Car
• Different Combating Tools
. Sniper Shooter Gun
• Smooth and intuitive controls
• Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics
• Prisoner Sniper game
• Thrilling and challenging Missions
